Functionality¶

mars_core.utils.func.InDepthUpdateDictAwithB(A, B)[source]¶

A function for update nested dictionaries A with B.

Parameters

  • A (dict) – a nested dictionary, e.g., dict, dict of dict, dict of dict of dict …

  • B (dict) – a nested dictionary, e.g., dict, dict of dict, dict of dict of dict …

Returns

updated dictionary

Return type

dict

mars_core.utils.func.LoadYAML2Dict(yaml_file, toAttr=False, mergeDefault=True, confs={})[source]¶

A function loading the hyper-parameters in yaml file into a dictionary.

Parameters

  • yaml_file (str) – the yaml file name

  • toAttr (bool, optional) – if True, transform the configuration dictionary into a class, such that each hyperparameter can be called with class.attribute instead of dict[‘attribute’]; defaults to False

  • mergeDefault (bool, optional) – if True, merge the default yaml file for missing entries, defaults to True

  • confs (dict, optional) – input a dictionary of configurations from outside the function, defaults to {}

Returns

a dictionary of configurations, including all hyper-parameters for environment, algorithm and training/testing.

Return type

dict

mars_core.utils.func.UpdateDictAwithB(A, B, withOverwrite=True)[source]¶

Update the entries in dictionary A with dictionary B.

Parameters

  • A (dict) – a dictionary

  • B (dict) – a dictionary

  • withOverwrite (bool, optional) – whether replace the same entries in A with B, defaults to True

Returns

an updated dictionary

Return type

dict
